## TCellAvatarContent type

Content for a table cell can be a name with an avatar. The avatar preceeds the name in the inline direction and the name labels the avatar.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TCellAvatarContent = ICellIconAvatarContent | ICellImageAvatarContent;
```
